answerText: Sir Isaac Newton[10] Halley used a method developed by James Gregory to calculate the sun's mean parallax. The method involved observations of these events, which occur in pairs of 8 years followed by 121 year gaps.
heading: NASAT  |2014 | 10 | 21 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Identify the following about the namesake of the most boring comet, Edmond Halley, for 10 points each.  [10] Halley's calculations of the comet probably relied on the work of this fellow scientist, who built the first reflecting telescope. Halley also persuaded this man to publish the Principia.
